statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT supply_name, location, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT id, supply_name FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY supply_name DESC, quantity ASC;
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 100;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE supply_name ILIKE '%mask%' OR supply_name ILIKE '%gloves%';
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT DISTINCT location FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY location ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE from_location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT supply_item_id, item_name, manufacturer FROM supply_items ORDER BY expiry_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_items WHERE item_description LIKE '%medical%' AND current_location NOT LIKE 'Store%';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE quantity > 100 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT supply_item_id, item_name FROM supply_items WHERE manufacturer = 'ABC Corp';
SELECT item_name, quantity FROM supply_items INNER JOIN supply_chain_transactions ON supply_items.supply_item_id = supply_chain_transactions.supply_item_id WHERE transaction_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT to_location, COUNT(*) FROM supply_chain_transactions GROUP BY to_location HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL AND from_location = 'Warehouse A' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT movement_id, movement_date, from_location, to_location FROM SupplyMovements;
SELECT supply_id, location, track_date FROM SupplyTrackHistory;
SELECT supply_name, quantity, location, blockchain_hash FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT supply_name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity > 50;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name, from_location, to_location FROM MedicalSupplies JOIN SupplyMovements ON MedicalSupplies.supply_id = SupplyMovements.supply_id;
SELECT MAX(quantity) AS max_quantity, MIN(quantity) AS min_quantity FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT supply_name, track_date FROM MedicalSupplies JOIN SupplyTrackHistory ON MedicalSupplies.supply_id = SupplyTrackHistory.supply_id WHERE location = 'Hospital A';
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies;
SELECT supply_name, manufacturer, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT supply_id, supply_name FROM medical_supplies ORDER BY supply_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain WHERE transaction_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin';
SELECT supply_name, quantity, unit_price FROM medical_supplies WHERE quantity > 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC;
SELECT user_name, user_role FROM users WHERE user_role = 'Admin' ORDER BY user_name;
SELECT transaction_id, supply_id, from_location, to_location, transaction_date FROM supply_chain WHERE supply_id = 3 ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;
SELECT block_id, transaction_id, block_hash, previous_block_hash, miner_id FROM blockchain_transactions WHERE miner_id = 5 ORDER BY block_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM medical_supplies JOIN supply_chain ON medical_supplies.supply_id = supply_chain.supply_id WHERE quantity < 20 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM MedicalSupplies;
SELECT name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY quantity DESC;
SELECT id, name, location, expiration_date FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, name, quantity, location FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE location = 'Storage Room A' ORDER BY quantity ASC;
SELECT * FROM Users WHERE role = 'Admin';
SELECT id, name, quantity FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE expiration_date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT id, name, location FROM MedicalSupplies ORDER BY name ASC
SELECT name, quantity, location FROM MedicalSupplies WHERE quantity < 100 ORDER BY quantity DESC
SELECT * FROM SupplyMovements WHERE from_location = 'Hospital A' AND to_location = 'Pharmacy B'
SELECT Users.username, Permissions.permission_type FROM Users JOIN Permissions ON Users.role = Permissions.role_id
